title: Together we can transform the country to become Wonder of Asia – Secretary Defence
content: Together, I have every confidence that we can transform this country not only into Asia’s next Knowledge Hub, but also the Wonder of Asia said Secretary, Ministry of Defence and Urban Development, Gotabaya Rajapaksa delivering the keynote address at the “WorkinSriLanka” Conference 2013 at the Taj Samudra Hotel in Colombo Monday morning (23)….
